sense.def:
To delay doing something
pomeni, da tistega ne storimo do poznejšega datuma.

seg.quote: Try and persuade them to delay some of the changes.

sense.def:
To delay someone or something
pomeni poskrbeti, da nekdo ali nekaj zamudi ali se upočasni.

seg.quote: I'm afraid I was slightly delayed.
The shock of the operation delayed his recovery.

sense.def:
Če se zgodi
a delay
, se nekaj zgodi pozneje, kot je bilo načrtovano ali pričakovano.

seg.quote: We shall inform you without delay.
